title: BadImageFormatException on .NET Framework 4.6.2 with AnyCPU setting AND Cannot found libskiasharp on desing view
body:
### Description

We are having problems with SkiaSharp 1.60.2 when we try to run our desktop application. The problem, in our opinion, is that you are not choosing correctly between x64 and x86 when compiling the solution.

On the other hand, we are having problems with the design view of the forms that use skiasharp (we can not use the design view on that forms) and we believe that this error could be related to the previous one.

I do not know if it will help or not, but if the problem is to decide on which platform to run the SkiaSharp version, a possible solution could be this:

### Code

var uri = new Uri(typeof(DWGSpatialDriver).Assembly.CodeBase);
var path = Path.Combine(Path.GetDirectoryName(uri.LocalPath), IntPtr.Size == 8 ? "x64" : "x86");
